comments.author: github-actions
comments.body: **Dignified Code Simplifier Review**: Line too long (90 chars) - Consider breaking into 2 lines for clarity. Example: `return InvalidObjectiveSlug(\n    raw_slug=slug, reason="Does not match required pattern"\n)` - Exceeds preferred line length

comments.author: schrockn
comments.body:
Fixed — broke the long line into 2 lines in commit e5d4c97a5.
